translations: adj.持续的，持久的；坚定的，坚持不懈的
v.维持，保持；遭受，经受；（在体力或精神方面）支持，支撑（sustain 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Witnesses say the firing was deliberate and sustained.
sentences.translation: 目击者说这次射击是蓄意的，而且还持续了一段时间。

sentences.sentence: He had sustained a cut on his left eyebrow.
sentences.translation: 他的左眉留下了一处伤口。

sentences.sentence: Every aircraft in there has sustained some damage.
sentences.translation: 那里的每架飞机都遭到了一些损坏。
